lead_paragraph: The ban outlaws lighting up in all public indoor areas and prohibits most tobacco advertising. But how effective it will be is an open question.
snippet: The ban outlaws lighting up in all public indoor areas and prohibits most tobacco advertising. But how effective it will be is an open question.

headline.main: Greece: Tougher Smoking Ban Takes Effect Wednesday
headline.print_headline: Greece: Tougher Smoking Ban Takes Effect Wednesday
